mapper.sql: order_status as orderStatus , create_time as createTime , online_order_no as onlineOrderNo , sales_mg_id as salesMgId , cancle_reason as cancleReason , avoidfood_name_array as avoidfoodNameArray , order_no as orderNo , online_people_num as onlinePeopleNum , update_time as updateTime , telphone as telphone , meal_standard as mealStandard , online_telphone as onlineTelphone , waiter_id as waiterId , bill_id as billId , dining_time as diningTime , online_gender as onlineGender , update_by as updateBy , tab_id as tabId , avoidfood_id_array as avoidfoodIdArray , order_way as orderWay , people_num as peopleNum , order_id as orderId , taste_id_array as tasteIdArray , online_payment_type as onlinePaymentType , moling_mode_cost as molingModeCost , online_uob_id as onlineUobId , mb_id as mbId , mc_id as mcId , taste_name_array as tasteNameArray , notes as notes , online_mobile as onlineMobile , ori_cost as oriCost , order_people_name as orderPeopleName , gender as gender , is_syn as isSyn , is_moling as isMoling , pungent_level as pungentLevel , online_order_id as onlineOrderId , bill_from as billFrom , syn_version as synVersion , version as version , online_area_id as onlineAreaId , online_dining_time as onlineDiningTime , create_by as createBy , online_area_name as onlineAreaName , rest_id as restId , prepay as prepay , online_order_people_name as onlineOrderPeopleName , ccd_id as ccdId , order_time as orderTime , online_user_mobile as onlineUserMobile , cpt_id as cptId , order_people_name_code as orderPeopleNameCode , tab_no as tabNo
mapper.insert:
insert into cm_table_order( order_status ,
create_time ,
online_order_no ,
sales_mg_id ,
cancle_reason ,
avoidfood_name_array ,
order_no ,
online_people_num ,
update_time ,
telphone ,
meal_standard ,
online_telphone ,
waiter_id ,
bill_id ,
dining_time ,
online_gender ,
update_by ,
tab_id ,
avoidfood_id_array ,
order_way ,
people_num ,
order_id ,
taste_id_array ,
online_payment_type ,
moling_mode_cost ,
online_uob_id ,
mb_id ,
mc_id ,
taste_name_array ,
notes ,
online_mobile ,
ori_cost ,
order_people_name ,
gender ,
is_syn ,
is_moling ,
pungent_level ,
online_order_id ,
bill_from ,
syn_version ,
version ,
online_area_id ,
online_dining_time ,
create_by ,
online_area_name ,
rest_id ,
prepay ,
online_order_people_name ,
ccd_id ,
order_time ,
online_user_mobile ,
cpt_id ,
order_people_name_code ,
tab_no
) values ( #{orderStatus } , #{createTime } , #{onlineOrderNo } , #{salesMgId } , #{cancleReason } , #{avoidfoodNameArray } , #{orderNo } , #{onlinePeopleNum } , #{updateTime } , #{telphone } , #{mealStandard } , #{onlineTelphone } , #{waiterId } , #{billId } , #{diningTime } , #{onlineGender } , #{updateBy } , #{tabId } , #{avoidfoodIdArray } , #{orderWay } , #{peopleNum } , #{orderId } , #{tasteIdArray } , #{onlinePaymentType } , #{molingModeCost } , #{onlineUobId } , #{mbId } , #{mcId } , #{tasteNameArray } , #{notes } , #{onlineMobile } , #{oriCost } , #{orderPeopleName } , #{gender } , #{isSyn } , #{isMoling } , #{pungentLevel } , #{onlineOrderId } , #{billFrom } , #{synVersion } , #{version } , #{onlineAreaId } , #{onlineDiningTime } , #{createBy } , #{onlineAreaName } , #{restId } , #{prepay } , #{onlineOrderPeopleName } , #{ccdId } , #{orderTime } , #{onlineUserMobile } , #{cptId } , #{orderPeopleNameCode } , #{tabNo } )
